name: Quarry Symbols
description: Markers indicating valuable stone deposits provide information about available building materials and potential economic opportunities. The markers help locate valuable resources, while the information can be valuable for construction and trade planning.
atmosphere: Carved symbols dot the landscape while surveying equipment and maps litter information-rich sites like ancient road signs. The air carries the scent of weathered stone, knowledge, and the promise of economic opportunity. Every surface feels the weight of resource knowledge. Your skin feels the weathered stone and the sense of competitive tension. The taste of valuable information and economic opportunity fills your mouth.
